column5: 2 bedrooms (one is a small, completely blacked out, soundproofed bedroom) with queen beds, large eat-in kitchen with dishwasher, washer and dryer, large living room with 50in TV and a driveway for off street parking.  The house is a $5 Uber from great bars on Lower Greenville! Quiet neighborhood about 2 miles from White Rock Lake and a block off the Santa Fe trail which is great for jogging and biking!  Please message me about your stay before you book!
